pr_title: Assorted fixes to making JSON the default

timeline.message: Support default JSON in Hibernate Validator interceptor

Avoid including all providers when defaulting to JSON

Otherwise, you end up with a native executable that is 10 MB larger.

Also defaults to JSON for the REST Client

It was already sort of doing it when you had the JSON server extensions
but we now make it the default even if you have just the JSON client
extensions around.
Improve documentation for JSON being the default
